en.StatusesPopupErrorNotInTeam: Sorry, but you need to be in a team to change the status
en.SecretPinsMod_descEnabled: When enabled, pins from skin bundles will become available to send in chat.
en.UseThemeAllScreens_descEnabled: When enabled, every game screen background will be replaced with menu background.
en.DisablePinAnimation_descEnabled: When enabled, every pin will become NOT animated.
en.HideLaserScreenMask_descEnabled: When enabled, black bars in battle will NOT be displayed.
en.SlowMode_descEnabled: When enabled, game will slow down (slow-mo effect).
en.RandomThemes_descEnabled: When enabled, menu theme will be different every game rejoin.
en.RandomThemesAfterBattle_descEnabled: When enabled, theme will be changed to random every time you enter and exit battle.
en.RandomThemesMusicIndependency_name: Music independent on the background for random theme
en.RandomThemesMusicIndependency_descEnable: When enabled, music will be different from its associated background.
en.ShowOpponentsInFriendlyRoom_name: Show opponent brawlers in friendly room
en.ShowOpponentsInFriendlyRoom_descEnabled: When enabled, you will be able to see all brawlers your opponents select in friendly room.
en.MovementBasedAutoshoot_descEnabled: When enabled, Mortis auto attack will be based on his movement.
en.BlockAttackAutoshoot_descEnabled: When enabled, you will NOT be able to use auto attack.
en.BlockSuperAutoshoot_descEnabled: When enabled, you will NOT be able to use auto attack for Super.
en.ShowFPSCounter_descEnabled: When enabled, an FPS counter will be displayed in the upper left corner of the screen.
en.ShowCameraButton_descEnabled: When enabled, a button to change camera modes will be displayed in battle.
en.LowResGraphics_descEnabled: When enabled, game will use low resolution textures when possible, which can help increase FPS.
en.HideLobbyInfo_descEnabled: When enabled, lobby information (mod authors and ping) will NOT be displayed.
en.ShowOwnPlayerCoordinatesInBattle_name: Show own brawler coordinates in battle
en.ShowOwnPlayerCoordinatesInBattle_descEna: When enabled, own character coordinates will be displayed in battle.
en.ShowConnectionIndicatorInBattle_descEnab: When enabled, a latency number will be shown in battle at the top of the screen.
en.HideUltiAiming_descEnabled: When enabled, other players will NOT be able to see the yellow circle under your brawler when you aim with Super in battle.
en.ShamePlayersWithThumbsdownPin_name: Highlight players who have thumbsdown pin in battle
en.ShamePlayersWithThumbsdownPin_descEnable: When enabled, players with thumbsdown pin will get a "[ğŸ¤¡]" prefix to their name in battle.
en.MMHack_descEnabled: When enabled, map maker will get hidden functionality.
en.BattleTextChat_descEnabled: When enabled, the battle chat interface will be displayed if you're in a team.
en.EmojiRemoveMod_name: Remove keyboard emoji in text chat
en.EmojiRemoveMod_descEnabled: When enabled, all keyboard emoji in text chat won't render so it will prevent spam crashes.
en.DoNotShowBattleHighlight_name: Don't play Â«Game HighlightÂ» after battle
en.DoNotShowBattleHighlight_descEnabled: When enabled, the Â«Game HighlightÂ» will never be played at the end of battle.
en.BetterRangeMod_descEnabled: When enabled, attack range will become extended for Fang.
en.ShowEnemyAmmoStatus_name: Show enemy ammo status in battle
en.ShowEnemyAmmoStatus_descEnabled: When enabled, enemy ammo status (orange bars) will be displayed in battle.
en.VisualChromaticName_descEnabled: When enabled, your name color will become chromatic as with purchased Brawl Pass.
en.BSDProxy_descEnabled: When enabled, you'll be connecting to the game server through proxy (irreplaceable for banned regions).
en.TeamChatAnticensor_descEnabled: When enabled, words won't be replaced with asterisks in the team chat.
en.HideBattlingStatusFromOthers_descEnabled: When enabled, when you enter a battle, your status won't be updated to "BATTLING", making others unable to spectate you.
en.ResetConfigPromptDesc: If something went wrong with the mod, you can always reset its settings
en.PingResultsWarning:
Testing...
Results will be shown in the lobby
en.BattleServerChanged: Battle Server has been changed to {battleServer}
en.UpdateNativeDialogDesc:
The main game has been updated, but you need to wait for BSD Brawl update.

We highly recommend subscribing to our Telegram channel so as not to miss anything!
en.RestartRequiredDescription: Full game restart required in order to apply changes.
en.EarlyAccessActivated: BSD+ has been successfully activated for this account!
en.VolumeSettingsAlreadyReset: Volume settings are already reset and saved
en.OutlineColorAlreadyReset: Outline color is already reset and saved
en.PaidFeatureDescription:
This is BSD+ feature
If you already have an activation key, create a team and send it to the team chat.
Purchase is available in @bsdpaybot Telegram bot through "Buy" button.
en.EarlyAccessAlreadyActivated: BSD+ was already activated for this account.

<cffff00>Note:</c> Low FPS values may help save your
battery and provide better performance, while higher
values makes gameplay more smooth.
en.FPSLimitAlreadyReset: FPS limit is already reset and saved

â¨  /profile <player_tag> â€” Open player profile.

en.AnimationsMenuDisclaimerDesc: This menu purpose is NOT to give you brawlers or skins for free (such a hack is IMPOSSIBLE to do on the official server) but to let you start and see animation of brawler/skin drop.
en.SkinChangerMovedDesc: Skin Changer was moved to the brawler skin selection screen!
en.FaqDialogDesc:
Q: Why can't I find Change Age, Log out all devices and Self-Destruction in battle functions?
A: These features have been completely patched by the game's developer, Supercell, and are therefore no longer available.

Q: Is there any chance that my game account will get banned for using BSD Brawl?
A: There has not been a single case of account ban for 2.5 years. We care of safety of your gaming experience. Our mod is also mostly visual, which means nobody will see that you're using it from their side.

Q: Is BSD Brawl free? Does it have any paid subscriptions? What do they include?
A: BSD Brawl is a completely free modification. The only paid subscription for this moment is BSD+ which provides early access to the updates.

Q: Who is the developer person of BSD Brawl?
A: If you want to contact developer directly, message @selces in Telegram Messenger in English or Russian, but keep in mind, that you may get blocked for being annoying.
en.EmulatorBannedFunction: Please don't use this function on an emulator!
en.HighlightLeonClone_descEnabled: When enabled, Leon clone will be highlighted with pink color.
en.OldRankSystem_descEnabled: When enabled, levels will return to previous system (level 35 = max).

Q: Why can't I find Change Age, Log out all devices and Self-Destruction in battle functions?
A: These features have been completely patched by the game's developer, Supercell, and are therefore no longer available.

Q: Is there any chance that my game account will get banned for using BSD Brawl?
A: There has not been a single case of account ban for 2.5 years. We care of safety of your gaming experience. Our mod is also mostly visual, which means nobody will see that you're using it from their side.

Q: Is BSD Brawl free? Does it have any paid subscriptions? What do they include?
A: BSD Brawl is a completely free modification. The only paid subscription for this moment is BSD+ which provides early access to the updates.

Q: Who is the developer person of BSD Brawl?
A: If you want to contact developer directly, message @selces in Telegram Messenger in English or Russian, but keep in mind, that you may get blocked for being annoying.
